title: Modern Sofa Set
description: Comfortable 3-seater sofa with fabric upholstery, perfect for living rooms. Features high-density foam cushions and a durable wooden frame. Available in multiple colors. Ideal for modern minimalist aesthetics.

title: Wooden Dining Table
description: Solid oak dining table for 6 people, featuring an elegant, classic design and superior durability. The wood is treated for stain resistance and easy maintenance. Perfect for family dinners and gatherings.

title: Recliner Armchair
description: Ergonomic leather recliner armchair with an easily adjustable backrest and footrest. Provides excellent lumbar support and luxurious comfort for reading or watching movies. Available in black and brown leather options.

title: Queen Bed Frame
description: Stylish queen-sized bed frame made of high-quality solid wood. Includes an integrated headboard with decorative paneling. Provides robust support and is designed for quick assembly.

title: Bookshelf
description: Tall wooden bookshelf featuring 5 wide, adjustable shelves. Ideal for organizing books, displaying decorative items, or storage in a home office or living room. Finished with a protective lacquer.

title: Coffee Table
description: Modern coffee table with a durable tempered glass top and elegantly designed wooden legs. Its minimalistic footprint makes it ideal for smaller spaces while providing functional surface area.

title: Wardrobe Cabinet
description: Spacious wardrobe cabinet with smooth-gliding sliding doors. Includes versatile internal organization with ample hanging space, shelving, and drawers for all your storage needs. Durable particle board construction.
